a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Statutory corporate income tax rate, 2000 to 2018
Estimates correspond to the combined rates for central and sub-central government levels (i.e. central government corporate tax rate, less
deductions for sub-national taxes, plus sub-central corporate tax rate). Figures correspond to the standard rate that is not targeted at
particular industries or income types. The top marginal rate is reported if the corporate tax system is progressive.
Data source: Corporate Tax Statistics Database (CTSD) - OECD (2019)
